oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Kays Ice Cream, from the Nashville Times, 1940
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A published photo from the Nashville Times (1940), about Kay’s Ice Cream. Info from the caption cites “many outstanding features of Kay’s Plant and Main Store at 1522 Church. (Top) Kay’s Modern Plant. (Left-center) Four of our attractive sales girls … (Right-lower) Our Church Street Store.” Forms part of the Nashville Times newspaper collection. 1 digital photo.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Kay’s Ice Cream (Nashville, Tenn.)
